abstract: Joe Sharkey On The Road column; Albatross One is used to test in-flight entertainment system from Row 44, which can include high-speed Internet, games and live television and on-demand movies.
snippet: An in-flight entertainment system from Row 44 can include high-speed Internet, games and live television, as well as a growing library of on-demand movies.
lead_paragraph: An in-flight entertainment system from Row 44 can include high-speed Internet, games and live television, as well as a growing library of on-demand movies.

headline.main: Speedy In-Flight Wi-Fi, Even During a Wild Ride
headline.seo: Row 44 Fine-Tuning Its Satellite Wi-Fi Systems for Airlines
headline.print_headline: Speedy In-Flight Wi-Fi, Even During a Wild Ride
